user.description: Configure GitHub Copilot integration. You'll need a GitHub token for Copilot SDK and either the Copilot CLI installed locally or the GitHub Copilot Bridge add-on running. For more information, visit the [documentation]({documentation_url}).

data_description.api_token: Your GitHub personal access token with Copilot permissions
data_description.model: The AI model to use for conversations
data_description.cli_url: URL of the GitHub Copilot Bridge add-on server (e.g. http://homeassistant.local:8000). Leave empty to use a locally installed Copilot CLI.

error.auth: Authentication failed. Please verify your GitHub token is valid and has Copilot permissions. Ensure you have an active GitHub Copilot subscription.
error.connection: Unable to connect to GitHub Copilot CLI. Please verify the Copilot CLI is installed and running (locally or via the add-on), and check the Copilot CLI URL if using the add-on.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the Home Assistant logs for details.

abort.already_configured: GitHub Copilot is already configured. Only one instance is allowed.
